snippet: We match Jill Alexander Essbaum's "Precipice" with two New Year's pieces about time, one about representations of time in the visual arts, and another from The Stone, a philosophy blog at The Times.
abstract: We match Jill Alexander Essbaum's "Precipice" with two New Year's pieces about time, one about representations of time in the visual arts, and another from The Stone, a philosophy blog at The Times.
